title: Eccentric French Specimen Doc
content:
I wanted to thank folks here for pointing out some great specimens, giving me some idea about what you like and for designing some great specimens. I must admit that as of a year ago I didn't even really have a clue.

This is my latest attempt. Good, bad or indifferent, please let me know what you like and/or dislike.

Here are the first and last pages. If you are interested in seeing the rest you can download the pdf here...

[Eccentric French PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018050343/http:/cdn.myfonts.com/s/aw/original/42/0/21920.pdf)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018050343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EFrenchSpecBook_1_6126.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018050343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EFrenchSpecBook_6_5742.jpg)

Thanks for looking.  
James
author: phrostbyte64
